title: Council Journal of Future Days
outcome: A Council journal containing future-dated entries surfaces, predicting key policy shifts and unrest. Council members and citizens become obsessed with whether to fight or fulfill the predictions, setting off political chaos and widespread speculation.

events.description: A Council archival clerk discovers a page in the official journal written in Halden's handwriting, describing political events two weeks into the future.
The Council quietly debates the journal's authenticity and meaning. Some members try to act as written, while others contest or conceal the predictions.
Rumors of the future-dated entries leak, fueling wild speculation and protest across Stenograd. Bookmakers take odds on various scenarios.
Citizens begin self-organizing around the predicted events—some holding preemptive rallies, others forming contingency groups to oppose the forecasted decisions.

On the date of the journal's last prediction, rival citizen groups fill the capital district. When Council actions diverge from the documented forecast, confusion and spontaneous celebrations erupt, further eroding trust in BCI and the Council.
